Versions of PythonÂ¶

The ImageMetaTag module has been tested on the following versions:

  • Python 2.7.5, 2.7.6, 2.7.12

  • Python 3.6.5

  • Python 3.8.16

  • Python 3.9.13

  • Python 3.10.9
